roll.description: roll a dice - defaults to 1d6, to select the number of dice, use a number - to change the dice type use d<number>/w<number>

errors.tooManyArgs: Error: too many Arguments. Only dice type and roll count are valid arguments. The odd argument is
errors.doubleDiceType: Error: Argument `dice type` is defined twice
errors.doubleRollCount: Error: Argument `roll count` is defined twice
errors.schroedingersArgument: Very strange error: Schroedingers Argument `Dice type` is defined and not defined
errors.noDiceType: Error: After validating arguments there is still no dicetype
errors.noSides: Error: you intented to roll a dice with no sides
errors.tooManyDice: The table is too small to throw that many dice on it. A maximum of 70 dice is allowed
errors.rollcountNotNumeric: You need to supply a number of dice, not random characters.
errors.rolltypeNotNumeric: You need to supply a number of sides for the dice, not random characters

noDice.plaintext: ...and {msgauthor} heard how the wind brushed over the empty table, on which there was not a single dice to be seen...
noDice.embed: If you want a result, it would probably be useful to throw a dice.

restart.start: The crystal appears to be renewing.
restart.success: This artifact has a new astral structure now.

newgif.description: Add a new gif to the database
newgif.wrongArgs:
You need to supply three arguments:
1. The gif URL
2. The action (e.g. `hug`)
3. The gif type (e.g. anime)
newgif.checking: I sent the owner a request to add the gif.

removegif.description: Remove a gif from the database
removegif.wrongArgs: You need to supply the link of the gif you want to remove
removegif.checking: I sent the owner a request to remove the gif.

new.getPrefix: Please enter the prefix for your new character.
new.getAvatar: Please enter a URL for the avatar of the character, otherwise reply with `n`.
new.getName: Please enter the name of the character you want to add.
new.success: The character {name} was assigned to the prefix {pref}.

name.description: Change your embed name (no specified name will result in nickname/username)
name.success: Your name has been changed to `{newname}`.

lang.description: Change the language for the guild
lang.permissionError: Only Administrators are allowed to change the guild language.
lang.noSuchLanguage: The requested Language is not available. Available languages are {languages}.
lang.success: Changed the language for this guild to {lang}

info.description: Get System info for the bot

multiUser: {a} hugs {b}. Squeeze hard but not too hard

singleUser: Do you want me to hold your hand, {a}?

eval.permissionError: You are not permitted to use the eval command

dsarm.noSuchChar: There is no character identified by `{pref}`.

dsaadd.args:
you need to supply three arguments:
1. the prefix
2. the avatar URL
3. the name to be displayed

dsa.description: Say a message as an NPC
dsa.permissions: I do not have all the necessary permissions. Please ensure that I have the permissions to manage Messages and Webhooks.
dsa.contentRequired: I need a message or an attachment to send.

singleUser: Do you need somebody to cuddle you?

color.description: Shows what colors you currently use
color.invalid_color: I don't know such a color.

addcolor.description: Adds colors to your embed colors

removecolor.description: Removes colors from your embed colors

setcolor.description: Sets your embed colors to the given colors

general.guildOnly: This command can only be used on a server.
